decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm your opponent with a swarm of aggressive Elf creatures. By utilizing mana dorks like Birchlore Rangers and Priest of Titania, you can quickly ramp up to play high-impact threats such as Nyxborn Hydra and Timberwatch Elf. Cards like Wellwisher and Lead the Stampede help to keep your hand full of resources and maintain the pressure on your opponent. With a low mana curve and a focus on creature-based aggression, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm your opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice effects and artifacts to control the board while applying constant pressure with aggressive creatures. By sacrificing artifacts like Ichor Wellspring and Cleansing Wildfire, players can trigger effects from cards like Fanatical Offering and Writhing Chrysalis to keep opponents on the back foot. The deck also includes removal spells like Krark-Clan Shaman and Cast Down to deal with opposing threats. With a mix of disruption, card advantage, and efficient threats, this Aggro-Jund deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure a victory.

The main focus of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to quickly deploy threats such as Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Counterspell and Dispel. The deck also utilizes card draw and card selection spells like Ponder, Brainstorm, and Thought Scour to maintain hand advantage and find the necessary pieces. Sleep of the Dead serves as a finisher to lock down the opponent's creatures, allowing the aggressive strategy to push through for the win.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a combination of low-cost creatures and efficient spells. By playing aggressively and disrupting the opponent's strategy with counterspells and bounce spells, this deck aims to control the tempo of the game and maintain board presence. The use of card draw spells like Brainstorm and Deep Analysis helps to ensure a consistent flow of resources, while cards like Cryptic Serpent and Delver of Secrets provide strong threats to pressure the opponent. Ultimately, the goal is to outpace the opponent and secure a victory through continuous pressure.

The primary focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells, particularly focusing on ramping up mana with cards like Arbor Elf and Utopia Sprawl to quickly play big threats like Annoyed Altisaur and Avenging Hunter. Utilizing land destruction with cards like Mwonvuli Acid-Moss and Thermokarst to disrupt the opponent's mana base is also a key strategy. The deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain board control through a mix of efficient creatures and disruptive spells.

The main goal of this deck is to generate a large amount of mana using cards like High Tide and Hidden Strings, allowing you to combo off and cast powerful spells quickly. Lórien Revealed helps to find the combo pieces you need, while cards like Merchant Scroll and Peer Through Depths provide card selection and dig for key cards. Once you have generated enough mana, you can win the game with a powerful spell like Ideas Unbound. The deck also includes some disruption in the form of Gigadrowse and Disrupt to protect your combo.

The deck focuses on manipulating mana with High Tide to generate large amounts of blue mana, allowing for explosive combo plays. It includes card draw and selection spells to help find key combo pieces, as well as control elements to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent. The goal is to set up a turn where High Tide is used in conjunction with spells like Psychic Puppetry and Lórien Revealed to generate a massive amount of mana, enabling the player to cast multiple spells in a single turn and win the game.

This Aggro Jund deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice effects to control the board while generating card advantage and recurring threats. By sacrificing artifacts and creatures, the deck can trigger effects and gain value through cards like Fanatical Offering and Refurbished Familiar. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Cast Down and Writhing Chrysalis to deal with opposing threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures, disruptive spells, and resource manipulation.

The primary focus of this Mono Black Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures and sacrifice synergies. By utilizing cards like Perigee Beckoner, Mortician Beetle, and Bloodthrone Vampire, the deck aims to generate value from sacrificing creatures and triggering abilities. With a mix of aggressive creatures, sacrifice outlets, and card draw in Village Rites, this deck aims to maintain a steady flow of threats while pressuring the opponent's life total.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells in order to quickly reduce their life total to zero. By using low-cost creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary along with efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Additionally, cards like Rally at the Hornburg and Goblin Tomb Raider provide additional value and card advantage to maintain the aggression. The deck prioritizes speed and efficiency to secure a victory in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 match.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures like Balustrade Spy using cards like Land Grant and Gatecreeper Vine, then utilize Dread Return to bring back powerful creatures and overwhelm the opponent with a sudden burst of aggression. The deck also includes cards like Lotleth Giant and Avenging Hunter to provide additional win conditions. The key strategy is to efficiently set up the graveyard and execute a powerful combo to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the game by utilizing low-cost spells and creatures. By constantly drawing cards with spells like Thought Scour and Mental Note, and countering opponent's threats with Counterspell and Dispel, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent. Tolarian Terror and Cryptic Serpent provide powerful creatures to attack with, while Brainstorm and Ponder help to set up the perfect draws. Lórien Revealed and Deem Inferior offer additional card advantage and disruption capabilities, allowing the deck to maintain its tempo and pressure.

The deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan through a combination of counter spells and card draw. By controlling the board with countermagic and utilizing cards like Thought Scour and Deep Analysis to cycle through the deck, the player can efficiently cast high-powered threats like Cryptic Serpent and Tolarian Terror. The inclusion of Lórien Revealed adds a proactive element to the control strategy, allowing the player to gain additional value from their spells. The deck aims to outlast opponents by efficiently utilizing resources and maintaining control of the game.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to generate card advantage and deal damage quickly to the opponent. By combining cheap artifacts like Ichor Wellspring and Myr Enforcer with cards like Galvanic Blast and Reckoner's Bargain, the strategy aims to overwhelm the opponent with a stream of threats. The inclusion of cards like Nihil Spellbomb and Krark-Clan Shaman also provides disruption against graveyard-based strategies, while cards like Makeshift Munitions and Hunter's Blowgun offer additional ways to push through damage. Overall, the deck seeks to maintain a fast, aggressive tempo while also disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with low-cost aggressive creatures and disruption spells in order to control the pace of the game. By utilizing flying creatures and counterspells, the deck aims to maintain board presence and prevent the opponent from mounting a strong defense. Additionally, the inclusion of card draw spells and ninjutsu creatures allows for constant card advantage and the ability to outmaneuver the opponent. Overall, the strategy of this deck is to apply early pressure and maintain control throughout the match.

The focus of this deck is to quickly play low-cost aggressive creatures and control the board with counterspells and disruption spells. Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent provide early threats while Thought Scour, Ponder, and Brainstorm help to draw cards and filter the deck. The deck aims to maintain board control with efficient counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce, as well as disruption spells like Deep Analysis, Dispel, and Sleep of the Dead. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient aggro strategy while disrupting their game plan.
